alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued September 22 at 9:08PM MDT until September 23 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than a quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Northern El Paso County/Monument Ridge/Rampart Range Below 7500 Feet and Colorado Springs Vicinity/Southern El Paso County/Rampart Range Below 7400 Feet Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
